item.description:
Agenda

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

Nicolette, known as the story teller will share a story with us about how to find a goddess.  This looks to be a fun and entertaining presentation! 

GoddessMatch.com :  Have you ever thought you needed extra help?  Find a goddess.  I was challenged to find my goddess after I discovered my friends relied on their goddesses.  Their goddesses helped with everything from managing unruly kids to increasing sex appeal.  Who wouldn’t want a goddess?  This story details my “Google:Goddess”  discoveries.

Nicolette Nordin Heavey

An entrepreneur soon after graduating from Smith College, Nicolette freelanced as a writer and started a DJ business while selling financial services.  Further business experience includes financial software sales, gaming software marketing and event management.  Nicolette coordinated fundraisers and did network marketing before launching herself as a professional storyteller and educator 10 years ago.  She is a storyteller for Bright Horizons Children’s Centers and is featured weekly at The Book Rack in Newburyport, Mass.  Nicolette taught massmouth’s StoriesLive ® curriculum in four high schools in 2011. She has been featured at the 2003 Boston Globe Children’s Festival; 2006 Three Apples Storytelling Festival; 2009 Sharing the Fire Story Concert(Rhode Island); 2009 3 rd Place finish in massmouth Big MouthOff finals; 2011 First Person Arts(Philadelphia) Story Slam concert. For more info: thestoryweaver@verizon.net  

 

1:15  - 1:30 - Networking and Wrap up

 

There will be a table available for business cards and promotional materials.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
